item.title: Recommended Pagination for APIs
item.description: The problem Your API needs to return a list of entities. The list can be quite big, even if you designed useful filters. Most of the time a client doesn’t need the entire list because: UX will suffer. If you have a frontend application, users don’t need to scroll thousands of entities at once. Performance will suffer. This happens both on a client and backend. The client needs to parse and render all retrieved entities, backend needs to read them all from a database.
